snippet: The “Million Dollar Listing” franchise has shown that a desire for television ratings can clash with the realities of real estate transactions.
abstract: Big Deal column; participation in Bravo's popular Million Dollar Listing series of reality television shows can be very lucrative for real estate brokers, who gain significant amount of free advertising; notes producers alter facts, re-shoot scenes and generally bend truth in effort to make messy world of real estate fit show's dramatic arc and season length.
lead_paragraph: The “Million Dollar Listing” franchise has shown that a desire for television ratings can clash with the realities of real estate transactions.

headline.print_headline: The Real and the Unreal on Reality TV
headline.seo: The Real and Unreal on TV’s Million Dollar Listing
headline.main: The Real and the Unreal on Reality TV
